name: KnifeBot
description:
Q to spawn new knife

E to throw/ release knife

Pro Tip: Throw speed is based on how much the mouse has moved before releasing.

Game I made for the Mini Jam 86: Sports GameJam.  Throwing stuff is a sport, I'm sure of it.

Let me know if you had fun playing or any suggestions for improvement.

Known Bugs:

Sometimes if you hit the last target in a room when your standing on the conveyor belt that changes directions, you get stuck or start moving in different directions.
